ygData.subject: Warning on Karana Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Some idiot is busy using multiple characters to rip people off.  He has made claims that his main Character is Gathaway BaneFlare - Leader of the Titan s
ygData.messageBody:
Some idiot is busy using multiple characters to rip people off. He has
made claims that his main Character is Gathaway BaneFlare - Leader of
the Titan's Tribunal guild. He makes a partial trade and says he will
get Gath and finish the trade, then he disappears. I can't find the 2
names I have written down but will post them as soon as I can get them.
Gathaway has 3 other Characters but won't trade in this way, if his
characters don't have the money on them, he'd use Gath for the full
trade.
Before anyone says "If you'r that stupid serves you right" please
consider some people do still trust others, in this case it cost a girl
500pp. Anyone who claims to represent any guild but doesn't have a
guild tag is lying. /who all titan will find you some members who
aren't anon too question if U need too.
Anyways I thought I'd drop a note, Gathaway is a friend who doesn't
cheat others, and I'd like anyone else on karana who may have heard of
this guy to post all characters he uses so we can warn our friends.

Malanni Mournblade <Titan's Tribunal>
Karana
